App Name: Diamond Live Wallpaper HD

It not only glamorizes your device but also respects your battery life and enhances your typing experience with a plethora of interactive features.

Core Features:

  • üñºÔ∏è HD Wallpapers 4K: Adorn your home and lock screen with high-quality, battery-efficient 4K live wallpapers.

Pros:
